items.title: WHAT WE CAN DO FOR YOU
items.summary: Consult with you to locate or build an application that will accomplish your goalsDesign, build, or change spreadsheets, databases, and database queriesPrototype/mock-up apps and databasesBuild…
items.content_html:
• Consult with you to locate or build an application that will accomplish your goals
  • Design, build, or change spreadsheets, databases, and database queries
  • Prototype/mock-up apps and databases
  • Build simple static websites
  • Enter, transform, and analyze your data
  • Provide computerized accounting and bookeeping services
  • Supply Linux-based computers loaded with programs that get things done
  • Tutor and support you one-on-one

 

May we find, design, and/or build a solution for you? If so, please contact us. 313.348.9400
